topics.body:
I just realized what is the plothole of x-men/any super hero genre/scifi/etc: humans will bang anything.

I'm not joking about that either; for decades evolutionary wise people thought that homosapians killed the other forms of humans, but turns out we all just banged and thus homosapiens were born.

If something like x-men or such were to happen the most probable scenario is that we'd all become one species within a couple generations of everyone banging.

topics.body:
Holy crap!

A computer beat a human in a verbal portion of a IQ test.

How did it do this?  It used deep learning; or converting human speech into a form that the computer could understand.



Also in AI news they've essentially taught a computer how to dream by basically running a image search, then reversing it so that it recalls the imagery; it's a bit more complicated than that but basically the image search comes up with thoughts onto what it believes is relevant.

Example image of what the computer "dreamed" of:
!http://cdn.singularityhub.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/this-is-what-happens-when-machines-dream-7.jpg!


It's not really intelligence, but rather essentially translating how humans understand things and reverse engineering it in a way a computer can understand.
